snippet: The former Yankees manager Joe Torre said Sunday he believed Roger Clemens deserved to be considered for the Hall of Fame, but he acknowledged that doubts remained about whether or not he took steroids en route to winning 354 games and a record seven...
abstract: The former Yankees manager Joe Torre said Sunday he believed Roger Clemens deserved to be considered for the Hall of Fame, but he acknowledged that doubts remained about whether or not he took steroids en route to winning 354 games and a record seven Cy Young Awards.

headline.main: To Torre, Clemens Is a Hall of Famer
